item.title: About
item.description: About Welcome to Cyprus Public Opinion Trends (C-POT)! The blog provides non-partisan information and quantitative analysis on Cypriots’ attitudes towards the social, political and cultural issues their society faces. Its objective is to make Cypriots’ views more accessible to the general public, journalists, academics and political professionals. Discussion of Greek-Cypriot and Turkish-Cypriot public opinion is a central feature of this endeavor. Quantitative analyses are based on publicly available survey data, and to ensure transparency software code to replicate all analyses is provided.

item.title: replication
item.description: This site was created using Markdown in the R statistical software, with the Blogdown package and a Hugo theme. Analyses were conducted in R and visualizations use the plotly package. R Markdown files with replication information for all analyses can be found on my GitHub page in the ‘post’ folder.
